# MCP服务器curl测试示例

## 启动MCP服务器

在独立终端中启动服务器（不在Jupyter环境中）：

```bash
cd /Users/forrest/GitHub/DNALLM
source .venv/bin/activate
cd dnallm/mcp
python start_server.py --config ./configs/mcp_server_config.yaml
```

## curl测试命令

### 1. 健康检查

```bash
curl -X GET http://localhost:8000/health
```

### 2. 列出已加载的模型

```bash
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/mcp/tools/list_loaded_models \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{}'
```

### 3. 获取模型信息

```bash
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/mcp/tools/get_model_info \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"model_name": "promoter_model"}'
```

### 4. 单序列预测

```bash
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/mcp/tools/dna_sequence_predict \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "sequence": "",
    "model_name": "promoter_model"
  }'
```

### 5. 多模型预测

```bash
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/mcp/tools/dna_multi_model_predict \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "sequence": "",
    "model_names": ["promoter_model", "conservation_model", "open_chromatin_model"]
  }'
```
